instruction: We have received your request to connect to your Focus account. You can use the verification code below to finalize your authentication :
code_expiration: This code is valid for the next 60 minutes. After this time, it will expire and you will have to request a new code if you were unable to log in.
alternative_text: You can also use the login link below :
footer_warning: If you did not request this account creation, you may ignore this email or contact us for more information.
